solution_line_template: When the price of the book is decreased by {decrease_percentage}, the total price decrease is {decrease_percentage}*${initial_price}=${<<{decrease_percentage}*{initial_price}={price_decrease_amount}>>}{price_decrease_amount}
The new price of the book becomes ${initial_price}-${price_decrease_amount} = ${<<{initial_price}-{price_decrease_amount}={price_after_decrease}>>}{price_after_decrease}
The price of the book is then increased by {increase_percentage}*{price_after_decrease} = ${<<{increase_percentage}*{price_after_decrease}={price_increase_amount}>>}{price_increase_amount}
The final price of the book is ${price_after_decrease}+${price_increase_amount} = ${<<{price_after_decrease}+{price_increase_amount}={final_price}>>}{final_price}
